reviewText:
Annapolis Book of Seamanship:
This will help you to learn how to be safer at sea on your sail boat
Sailboat Navigation, Volume 4
You need to learn what it is like to understand where you are on the water and how to go in a strait line even with the tide pushing you sideways.

It's big, it covers just about everything. You can not read this in one or even many sittings cover to cover. It's a book to reference, a book to look up answers to questions and issues and a great book to thumb through. You need to know this information if you are going to become more than a hazard on the seas.
